titleStmt.title: The sting of death and death vnstvng delivered in two sermons in which is shewed the misery of the death of those that dye in their sins, & out of Christ, and the blessedness of theirs that dye in the Lord : preached on the occasion of the death of the truely noble and virtuous Lady Mildmay / by Leonard Hoar ...
titleStmt.author: Hoar, Leonard, 1630?-1675.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
